languages.text: "Я тоже иду. В палатах плазмадвигателя у меня есть пара, хм, хороших знакомых, которые знают все обо всех. Убедить их помочь будет несложно, тем более, что кое-кто из них мне задолжал. Так что придется нам отправляться втроем. Вот так компания!" {n}Мрачный смех Энриха отдается эхом от стен святилища.{/n}

"I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я тоже иду. В палатах плазмадвигателя у меня есть пара, хм, хороших знакомых, которые знают все обо всех. Убедить их помочь будет несложно, тем более, что кое-кто из них мне задолжал. Так что придется нам отправляться втроем. Вот так компания!" {n}Мрачный смех Энриха отдается эхом от стен святилища.{/n}

Convincing them should not be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. So there will be three of us. What company!" {n}Einrich's grim laugher echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

Convincing them should not be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. So, there will be three of us. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

"I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

"I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich gehe auch. Ich habe einige ... gute Freunde in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern, von der neugierigen Sorte, die alles über jeden weiß. Sie zu überreden, sollte nicht schwer sein, schon gar nicht, wenn ich einige Gefallen einfordere. Dann gehen also wir drei. Was für eine Gesellschaft!" {n}Einrichs grimmiges Gelächter hallt durch den Schrein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich gehe auch. Ich habe einige ... gute Freunde in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern, von der neugierigen Sorte, die alles über jeden weiß. Sie zu überreden, sollte nicht schwer sein, schon gar nicht, wenn ich einige Gefallen einfordere. Dann gehen also wir drei. Was für eine Gesellschaft!" {n}Einrichs grimmiges Gelächter hallt durch den Schrein.{/n}

languages.text: «Yo también voy. Tengo un par de... buenos amigos en las cámaras del motor de plasma, gente indiscreta que lo sabe todo de todo el mundo. No será difícil convencerlos, sobre todo si pido que me devuelvan unos cuantos favores. Seremos los tres, pues. ¡Buena compañía!». {n}La siniestra carcajada de Einrich reverbera por los muros del templo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo también voy. Tengo un par de... buenos amigos en las cámaras del motor de plasma, gente indiscreta que lo sabe todo de todo el mundo. No será difícil convencerlos, sobre todo si pido que me devuelvan unos cuantos favores. Seremos los tres, pues. ¡Buena compañía!». {n}La siniestra carcajada de Einrich reverbera por los muros del templo.{/n}

languages.text: 「私も行きます。プラズマドライブ室には何人か親しい者達がいるんです。何でも知ってる詮索好きの奴らでね。説得するのは難しくない。特にエサをちらつかせれば楽勝です。てことでこの3人で行きますか。なんてパーティなんでしょう！」{n}アインリッヒの渋い笑い声が神殿の中に響く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私も行きます。プラズマドライブ室には何人か親しい者達がいるんです。何でも知ってる詮索好きの奴らでね。説得するのは難しくない。特にエサをちらつかせれば楽勝です。てことでこの3人で行きますか。なんてパーティなんでしょう！」{n}アインリッヒの渋い笑い声が神殿の中に響く。{/n}

languages.text: “我也要去，我在等离子驱动室里有几个……好朋友。他们很喜欢到处打听，对所有人都了如指掌，说服他们应该挺容易的。如果我再愿意提供点好处的话，那就更容易了。我们三个一起去吧，真是支不错的队伍！”{n}艾因里奇冷峻的笑声回荡在圣殿之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我也要去，我在等离子驱动室里有几个……好朋友。他们很喜欢到处打听，对所有人都了如指掌，说服他们应该挺容易的。如果我再愿意提供点好处的话，那就更容易了。我们三个一起去吧，真是支不错的队伍！”{n}艾因里奇冷峻的笑声回荡在圣殿之中。{/n}

languages.text: « Je viens aussi... J'ai quelques... amis sûrs dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Du genre curieux sachant tout sur tout le monde. Les convaincre ne devrait pas être trop difficile, surtout qu'ils me doivent quelques faveurs. Nous serons trois, donc. Quelle fine équipe ! » {n}s'exclame Einrich dont le rire sinistre résonne dans le sanctuaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je viens aussi... J'ai quelques... amis sûrs dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. Du genre curieux sachant tout sur tout le monde. Les convaincre ne devrait pas être trop difficile, surtout qu'ils me doivent quelques faveurs. Nous serons trois, donc. Quelle fine équipe ! » {n}s'exclame Einrich dont le rire sinistre résonne dans le sanctuaire.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de geliyorum. Plazma iticisi odalarında birkaç yakın... Arkadaşım var. Herkese dair her şeyi bilen, meraklı tipler. Onları ikna etmek, özellikle de eski iyiliklerimin karşılığını istersem zor olmayacaktır. O hâlde üçümüz birlikte gideceğiz. Harika bir grup olduk!" {n}Einrich'in zalim kahkahası, mabedin dört bir yanında yankılanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm going too. I have a couple of... good friends in the plasma drive chambers, the nosy kind who know everything about everyone. Convincing them shouldn't be difficult, especially if I pull a few favours. It'll be the three of us, then. What a company!" {n}Einrich's grim laughter echoes inside the shrine.{/n}
